product_data.title: Hero Xpulse 200 4V (ABS Disc) Bike Matt Nexus Blue White Booking for Ex-Showroom Price
reviews: The suspension is awesome and the driving experience can be compared with horse riding. Literally, it felt like a horse to me.
Very good with very good delivery
The suspension is awesome and the driving experience can be compared with horse riding. Literally, it felt like a horse to me.

The bike's front suspension doesn't take hard humps easily. Even commuter bikes do run well on humps. But xpulse makes weird noise (front suspension) whenever It runs through humps.I think hero material quality is very low compared to any brands which are in market.The only thing is it's price is quite okay as a 200cc bike.. pickup is good.
